attributes.action: Prioritise Retail staff and their families for COVID vaccinations
attributes.additional_details: Without the Supermarket workers the country would be at a standstill, the NHS and Carers have been prioritised. It's time to prioritise those keeping the country fed and watered
attributes.background: Supermarkets have remained open throughout the Pandemic and yet despite controls implemented by the employers, more and more staff are contracting the virus, we are putting ourselves at risk daily and we should be vaccinated to protect ourselves and our families
